title: STORE BUG
body:
Is it only me or is the "**unlock**" button in the store client? It has been like this fore more than a week, when i first countered the bug I thought it was something wrong with the Client so i tried closing the League and open it again hoping it will fix it, But nothing changed. I mean everything in the Store client was working fine except for the "**Featured**" section where the slide for 50% off champion and skins. 

I contacted Riot few days ago and they found out that it's a bug that they will fix but there is no guarantee of the date that it will be fixed.

_Is anyone else getting this bug?_

In the meantime, in order to purchase the champions that are on sale right now, please follow the steps below:

Open the Store client
Click Champions on the left side of the Store client.
Under Filters section, please uncheck "**Not Owned**" by clicking the square beside it.
Click On Sale.
After you follow these steps, you'll see the champions that are currently on sale.

replies.body:
Hey man,

While I can't test this at the moment as im away from my computer I figured I'd still chime in.

If Riot support has confirmed and acknowledged that this is a bug that will be fixed, its pretty safe to assume a majority, if not all players are affected by it.

Thanks for posting a temporary "fix" for others to utilise :)
